biotools.summary: Web application which provides users with a range of microarray gene expression data clustering algorithms. Algorithms can be run concurrently on the same data sets. Data can be visualized by heat maps and downloaded as a standard clustered data file for further analysis.

bioschemas.name: AMICa
bioschemas.summary: Web application which provides users with a range of microarray gene expression data clustering algorithms. Algorithms can be run concurrently on the same data sets. Data can be visualized by heat maps and downloaded as a standard clustered data file for further analysis.
